svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/142.0.0.0" scale="1" border="0" version="28.2.7"> <diagram name="Failure Modes and Solutions" id="failure-modes"> <mxGraphModel dx="2075" dy="1055" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1600" pageHeight="1000" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="title" value="System Failure Modes &amp; Solutions" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=28;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="20" width="800" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="subtitle" value="<span>Pattern-Based Problem Diagnosis and Solution Framework</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontStyle=3;fontColor=#666666;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="70" width="800" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail1-box" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffcccc;strokeColor=#b85450;shadow=1;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="140" width="320" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail1-title" value="FAILURE MODE 1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#b85450;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="155" width="210" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail1-name" value="Semantic Mismatch" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="220" width="280" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail1-desc" value="<span>Similar Surface Form, Different Meaning</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=3" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="245" width="280" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail1-example" value="<span>&nbsp; Pattern:<br>&nbsp; Input: Constraint(A AND NOT B)<br>&nbsp; Output: Matches A OR B<br>&nbsp; (Logical requirements violated)</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6e6;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=10;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="270" width="280" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sol1-box" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;shadow=1;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="360" width="320" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sol1-title" value="SOLUTION" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#82b366;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="375" width="210" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sol1-name" value="Hybrid Matching Strategy" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="440" width="280" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sol1-alt" value="<span>OR Input Decomposition + Rewriting</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=3" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="465" width="280" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;strokeWidth=3;strokeColor=#82b366;curved=1;fontStyle=1" parent="1" source="fail1-box" target="sol1-box" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail2-box" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffcccc;strokeColor=#b85450;shadow=1;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="140" width="320" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail2-title" value="FAILURE MODE 2" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="460" y="220" width="280" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail2-desc" value="<span>Multi-Step Dependencies Unresolved</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=3" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="460" y="245" width="280" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail2-example" value="<span>&nbsp; Pattern:<br>&nbsp; Request: Compare(EntityA, Baseline)<br>&nbsp; Returns: Only EntityA<br>&nbsp; (Missing reference point)</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6e6;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=10;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="460" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail3-example" value="<span>&nbsp; Pattern:<br>&nbsp; Query: Resolve(ProxyReference)<br>&nbsp; Returns: Local fragment<br>&nbsp; (Missing binding to scope context)</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6e6;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=10;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=3" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1180" y="245" width="280" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail4-example" value="<span>&nbsp; Pattern:<br>&nbsp; Query: Find(UniqueIdentifier)<br>&nbsp; Returns: ∅<br>&nbsp; (Abstraction layer misses literal)</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6e6;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=10;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1180" y="270" width="210" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail5-name" value="Generative Drift" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail5-desc" value="<span>Output Deviation from Source</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=3" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="645" width="280" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail5-example" value="<span>&nbsp; Pattern:<br>&nbsp; Input: Correct grounding data<br>&nbsp; Process: Transform(Input)<br>&nbsp; Output: Unfaithful derivation</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6e6;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=10;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="fail6-example" value="<span>&nbsp; Pattern:<br>&nbsp; Query: Relation(X, Y)<br>&nbsp; Returns: Attributes(X), Attributes(Y)<br>&nbsp; (Missing edge width="210" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="sol6-name" value="Graph-Based Resolution" parent="1" source="fail6-box" target="sol6-box" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend-box" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1f5ff;strokeColor=#0066cc;shadow=1;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="800" y="540" width="680" height="360" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend-title" value="&nbsp;Implementation Strategy Matrix" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#0066cc;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="550" width="640" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="priority-title" value="Deployment Order by Risk Profile:" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="590" width="300" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="priority1" value="1️⃣ Dual-Mode Matching (Low risk, high ROI)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ccffcc;strokeColor=#00cc00;fontSize=11;align=left;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="620" width="300" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="priority2" value="2️⃣ Context-Aware Segmentation (High impact)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ccffcc;strokeColor=#00cc00;fontSize=11;align=left;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="655" width="300" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="priority3" value="<span>3️⃣ Deferred Decomposition (Scope control)</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#d6d600;fontSize=11;align=left;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="690" width="300" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="priority4" value="<span>4️⃣ Iterative Resolution (Complex queries)</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#d6d600;fontSize=11;align=left;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="725" width="300" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="priority5" value="<span>5️⃣ Verification Loops (High-stakes output)</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontSize=11;align=left;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="760" width="300" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="priority6" value="<span>6️⃣ Graph-Based Resolution (Niche domains)</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontSize=11;align=left;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="795" width="300" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="complexity-title" value="Implementation Cost vs Value:" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1140" y="590" width="300" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="complexity1" value="<span>&nbsp; Low Cost, High Value:<br>&nbsp; • Hybrid matching strategies<br>&nbsp; • Context-aware processing</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ccffcc;strokeColor=#00cc00;fontSize=10;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1140" y="620" width="300" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="complexity2" value="<span>&nbsp; Medium Cost, Medium Value:<br>&nbsp; • Deferred decomposition<br>&nbsp; • Iterative resolution<br>&nbsp; • Input rewriting</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#d6d600;fontSize=10;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1140" y="690" width="300" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="complexity3" value="<span>&nbsp; High Cost, Very High Value:<br>&nbsp; • Graph-based systems<br>&nbsp; • Verification loops<br>&nbsp; • Dependency resolvers</span>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontSize=10;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1140" y="770" width="300" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="note" value="<span>&nbsp;Incremental Adoption: Start with foundational patterns. Most systems achieve 85%+ reliability with first two tiers.</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#0066cc;fillColor=#e1f5ff;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=11;fontStyle=3" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="850" width="620" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

Pattern:
Input: Constraint(A AND NOT B)
Output: Matches A OR B
(Logical requirements violated)

Low Cost, High Value:
• Hybrid matching strategies
• Context-aware processing
